summary: In this context, 3-Nitrotyrosine and 3-nitrotyrosine refer to the same compound, as indicated by their identical chemical structure and nomenclature. The study discusses the detection of nitrotyrosine in exhaled breath condensate (EBC) samples, highlighting its quantification and prevalence among healthy subjects. The terms are used interchangeably, emphasizing the compound's significance in the analysis without any distinct differences in their relationship.
